task.title: Attach a phone to the ring light
task.shortdesc: How to attach a phone to the Valusinâ„¢ 10" ring light.

context.p: It is best practice to attach the phone to the ring light before attaching the ring light to a tripod.

info.p: Place the screw pad on the screw inside the ring light, twisting until secure. One hand holds the ring light while the other hand twists on the screw pad.

Place the phone holder on the screw pad, twisting it until it is secure and facing the right direction. The front of the phone should face the front of the light. One hand holds the base of the ring light while the other hand twists the phone holder to secure it in place.

Twist the side screw on the phone holder to adjust it to the right width to secure the phone. One hand holds the base of the ring light while the other hand twists the screw at the top of the phone holder.

Twist the back screw on the phone holder to rotate the phone, tightening it to secure the phone in the desired position. You can set up the phone vertically or horizontally.
One hand holds the phone while the other hand twists the screw on the back of the phone holder.
